data.title: Mark Rydell
data.text:
Born: 23-Mar-1934

Birthplace: New York City

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Film Director

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: On Golden Pond

Wife: Joanne Linville (actress, m. 1962, div. 1973, one son, one daughter)

Son: Christopher Rydell (actor)

Daughter: Amy Rydell

University: Juilliard School

FILMOGRAPHY AS DIRECTOR

Even Money (Mar-2006)

For the Boys (16-Jan-1991)

The Rose (7-Nov-1979)

Harry and Walter Go to New York (17-Jun-1976)

Cinderella Liberty (7-Apr-1974)

The Cowboys (13-Jan-1972)

The Reivers (25-Dec-1969)

The Fox (13-Dec-1967)
